mapper.select: SELECT * FROM DICT WHERE STATUS = '1' ORDER BY PARENT_ID,DICT_LEVEL,TO_NUMBER(SEQ_NUM) ASC
SELECT * FROM DICT WHERE STATUS = '1' ORDER BY PARENT_ID,DICT_LEVEL,CAST(SEQ_NUM AS SIGNED) ASC
SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(SEQ_NUM)) FROM DICT STATUS = '1' AND PARENT_ID = #{parent_id}
SELECT MAX(CAST(SEQ_NUM AS SIGNED)) FROM DICT STATUS = '1' AND PARENT_ID = #{parent_id}
SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(DICT_ID)) FROM DICT WHERE STATUS = '1'
SELECT MAX(CAST(DICT_ID AS SIGNED)) FROM DICT WHERE STATUS = '1'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DICT AND DICT_CODE LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{dict_code},'%') AND DICT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{dict_name},'%') AND PARENT_ID = #{parent_id}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PAGE_SUB.*,ROWNUM AS RN FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T1.DICT_ID, T1.PARENT_ID, T1.DICT_CODE, T1.DICT_VALUE, T1.DICT_NAME, T1.ABR, T1.HLP, T1.SEQ_NUM, T1.DICT_LEVEL, T1.STATUS FROM DICT T1 AND T1.DICT_CODE LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{dict_code},'%') AND T1.DICT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{dict_name},'%') ) ORDER BY DICT_ID ASC )PAGE_SUB ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT T1.DICT_ID, T1.PARENT_ID, T1.DICT_CODE, T1.DICT_VALUE, T1.DICT_NAME, T1.ABR, T1.HLP, T1.SEQ_NUM, T1.DICT_LEVEL, T1.STATUS FROM DICT T1 AND T1.DICT_CODE LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{dict_code},'%') AND T1.DICT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{dict_name},'%') ORDER BY DICT_ID ASC LIMIT #{start},#{pageSize}

SELECT T1.DICT_ID, T1.PARENT_ID, T1.DICT_CODE, T1.DICT_VALUE, T1.DICT_NAME, T1.ABR, T1.HLP, T1.SEQ_NUM, T1.DICT_LEVEL, T1.STATUS FROM DICT T1 T1.STATUS = '1' AND T1.DICT_ID = #{dict_id} AND T1.DICT_CODE LIKE #{dict_code}||'%' AND T1.DICT_NAME LIKE LIKE CONCAT(#{dict_name},'%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DICT ( DICT_ID, PARENT_ID, DICT_CODE, DICT_VALUE, DICT_NAME, ABR, HLP, SEQ_NUM, DICT_LEVEL, STATUS) VALUES ( #{dict_id}, #{parent_id}, #{dict_code}, #{dict_value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dict_name}, #{abr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hlp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seq_num}, #{dict_level}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE DICT SET STATUS = #{status} DICT_ID IN (${ids})
